cause.description:
to hold accountable all police that break the law ex. real sentences for there real crimes
1. police should be held twice as accountable to the law they swore to uphold
2. to bring truth and justice back to the people the system is intended for instead of making them victims by their protectors
3. SEND COPS TO JAIL TO SEE IF IT HELPS THEM GET BETTER!!!!!!!!!!
cause.mission: stop crooked and violent cops from thinking they are above the law and abusing there power
cause.name: prosicution of crooked and violent police officers in st thomas
